subject: Re: Unable to make Junit4.3.1 work on my windows XP
msgSnippet: D: Develope tools java junit4.3.1 junit-4.3.1.jar;D: Develope tools java junit4.3.1 ;C: Program Files Java j2re1.4.1_02 lib ext QTJava.zip ... the ...
messageBody:
D:\Develope tools\java\junit4.3.1\junit-4.3.1.jar;D:\Develope
tools\java\junit4.3.1\;C:\Program Files\Java\j2re1.4.1_02
\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <saff@...> wrote:
>
> Can you post the exact value of your CLASSPATH?
>
> David Saff
>
> On 7/17/07, oferstu <oferstu@...> wrote:
> > I have installed JUnit4.3.1 according to the installation notes.
> > That is, I unzipped the zip file into a folder, and then I added
the
> > directory and jar file into CLASSPATH.
> > when I run java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore
org.junit.tests.AllTests
> >
> > I get "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
> > org/junit/runner/JUnitCore"
> >
> > I have to note that other people got the exact same problem.
> > How can this be solved?
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Yahoo! Groups Links
> >
> >
